00043         public static string Minify(string Input)
00044         {
00045             string[] CodeLines = Input.Split(new string[] { System.Environment.NewLine, "\n" }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);
00046             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00047             foreach (string Line in CodeLines)
00048             {
00049                 string Temp = Line.Trim();
00050                 if (Temp.Length > 0 && !Temp.StartsWith("//"))
00051                     Builder.AppendLine(Temp);
00052             }
00053 
00054             Input = Builder.ToString();
00055             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, "(/" + Regex.Escape("*") + ".*?" + Regex.Escape("*") + "/)", string.Empty);
00056             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, @"^[\s]+|[ \f\r\t\v]+$", String.Empty);
00057             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, @"^[\s]+|[ \f\r\t\v]+$", String.Empty);
00058             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, @"([+-])\n\1", "$1 $1");
00059             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, @"([^+-][+-])\n", "$1");
00060             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, @"([^+]) ?(\+)", "$1$2");
00061             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, @"(\+) ?([^+])", "$1$2");
00062             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, @"([^-]) ?(\-)", "$1$2");
00063             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, @"(\-) ?([^-])", "$1$2");
00064             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, @"\n([{}()[\],<>/*%&|^!~?:=.;+-])", "$1");
00065             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, @"(\W(if|while|for)\([^{]*?\))\n", "$1");
00066             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, @"(\W(if|while|for)\([^{]*?\))((if|while|for)\([^{]*?\))\n", "$1$3");
00067             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, @"([;}]else)\n", "$1 ");
00068             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, @"(?<=[>])\s{2,}(?=[<])|(?<=[>])\s{2,}(?=&nbsp;)|(?<=&ndsp;)\s{2,}(?=[<])", String.Empty);
00069 
00070             return Input;
00071         }
00072 
00078         public static string Combine(List<string> Input)
00079         {
00080             StringBuilder Output = new StringBuilder();
00081             foreach (string Temp in Input)
00082             {
00083                 Output.Append(Temp + "\n");
00084             }
00085             return Minify(Output.ToString());
00086         }
